title: Blue Essence Mission without payout
body:
I had 2 quests one for 30,000 blue essence and one for 5,000.  I believe these were the amounts, and I've completed them both but my account only has ~10k blue essence?

Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Make sure you remember to go into your loot to open the orbs the mission gave you!
oh duh. Your rewards come in the form of blue orbs which you then redeem for the blue essence. I was confused myself. It is under loot tab.
